title: Purchase History
body:
Hello,

how can i view all my purchase history on the store? I can only see the last 20 or so purchases made. Is there a way?

Thank in advanced

replies.body: Purchase history will show more recent purchases through the client.  You might be able to obtain a full history of purchases through the [Privacy Page](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/), with some legwork and a small fee for processing.  Hope that helps!
